abstract: The VMware-Microsoft battle matters because virtual machine software is a strategic technology that could shape broader markets.
snippet: The VMware-Microsoft battle matters because virtual machine software is a strategic technology that could shape broader markets.
lead_paragraph: I wrote an article Monday on the competition between VMware and Microsoft in virtual machine software. Truth is, this is the sort of story that, by the standards of The New York Times, falls into the realm of subjects geeky but perhaps of broad significance. Sometimes, the importance of plumbing technology extends well beyond the purview of plumbers.

headline.main: VMware vs. Microsoft: It’s About More Than the Plumbing
